name: Latte
description: The latte combines a base of espresso with a generous amount of steamed milk, resulting in a silky, rich drink that balances the strength of the coffee with a delicate creaminess. Topped with a thin layer of microfoam, a latte is smooth and mildly sweet, making it perfect for those who enjoy a softer, milky coffee experience. It’s often a canvas for latte art, showcasing beautiful designs in the foam.

name: Macchiato
description: Translating to “stained” or “marked” in Italian, the macchiato is an espresso-based drink with just a hint of foamed milk, preserving the bold, intense flavor of the coffee. The dash of milk adds a subtle sweetness without overpowering the coffee’s strong, rich profile. It’s ideal for those who love the depth of espresso but want a touch of creaminess.

name: Espresso
description: The heart of many coffee drinks, espresso is a small yet potent shot of coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans. Its concentrated flavor is bold and intense, with a thick, rich crema on top that enhances the complexity of the coffee’s natural flavors. Espresso captures the full essence of the coffee bean in a single sip, offering a pure, unadulterated coffee experience.

name: Americano
description: This coffee is made by adding hot water to a shot of espresso, resulting in a beverage with a similar strength to regular brewed coffee but with the rich, complex flavors of espresso. An Americano has a smooth, medium body with a well-rounded taste that balances the robust flavor of espresso with a lighter, more approachable texture, ideal for those who enjoy a strong yet mellow coffee.

name: Black coffee
description: Black coffee is simply brewed coffee without milk or sugar, allowing the natural flavors of the coffee beans to shine through. It’s a straightforward, no-frills beverage, perfect for coffee purists who appreciate the subtle, nuanced notes of quality beans. Whether made with a French press, pour-over, or drip coffee maker, black coffee offers a rich, satisfying taste that varies based on the origin and roast of the beans used.
